actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Environment and Public Works.

actions.committee: Committee on Environment and Public Works Subcommittee on Clean Air and Nuclear Safety
actions.text: Committee on Environment and Public Works Subcommittee on Clean Air and Nuclear Safety. Hearings held.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Clean Air and Nuclear Safety

official_title: A bill to require the Administrator of the Environmental Protection Agency to establish a program under which the Administrator shall defer the designation of an area as a nonattainment area for purposes of the 8-hour ozone national ambient air quality standard if the area achieves and maintains certain standards under a voluntary early action compact plan.

titles.title: A bill to require the Administrator of the Environmental Protection Agency to establish a program under which the Administrator shall defer the designation of an area as a nonattainment area for purposes of the 8-hour ozone national ambient air quality standard if the area achieves and maintains certain standards under a voluntary early action compact plan.

A bill to require the Administrator of the Environmental Protection Agency to establish a program under which the Administrator shall defer the designation of an area as a nonattainment area for purposes of the 8-hour ozone national ambient air quality standard if the area achieves and maintains certain standards under a voluntary early action compact plan.
